text: @senatemajldr This BS your spouting is not working. Republicans let CARES Act expire. We know Dems plan was finished and sent over months ago.  Dems focused on helping the people struggling with Covid19 & the unemployed.  Rep focus on Big Biz, military, Trumps DC hotel disguised as FBI.
